_description: James Ryman, A hymn to God in Trinity — fourteen quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Te deum verumque laudamus’ and burden: ‘Alpha et o quem vocamus / Te deum verumque laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O god & man sempiternallThat hast made vs free that were
                    thrall…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…With contrite hert & with myelde moodeTe deum verumque
                        laudamus
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 241-2.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 200-1; 1977, 177.
